Description: Handle sliver of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-brown. Triangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 173, 24 or, less likely, 31, 16 or 31, 50. Perhaps from same die as a piece from Kaunos, B.Schmaltz, Die Hellenistischen Amphorenstempel vom Kaunos (Asia Minor Studien 79) 91, KA 216.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1236)
